item.title: 马来西亚MH370客机失踪中国家属向法庭寻求赔偿
item.description:
A Beijing court on Monday began compensation hearings for the Chinese relatives of passengers on board Malaysia Airlines flight MH370, which mysteriously disappeared over the Indian Ocean almost a decade ago, the plaintiffs said.翻译:原告称，北京一家法院周一开始为马来西亚航空公司 MH370 航班乘客的中国亲属举行赔偿听证会，该航班近十年前在印度洋神秘失踪。

Over 150 Chinese passengers were on the flight which vanished en route from Kuala Lumpur to Beijing on March 8, 2014. Malaysian investigators did not rule out the possibility that the aircraft had been deliberately taken off course, and debris confirmed or believed to be from the aircraft has washed up along the coast of Africa and on islands in the Indian Ocean.翻译:2014 年 3 月 8 日，这架航班在从吉隆坡飞往北京的途中失踪，机上载有 150 多名中国乘客。马来西亚调查人员不排除飞机被故意偏离航线的可能性，残骸已确认或相信来自飞机。飞机被冲到非洲海岸和印度洋岛屿上。

Relatives of these passengers said they were demanding compensation from Malaysia Airlines, Boeing, aircraft engine maker Rolls-Royce and Allianz insurance group among others.翻译:这些乘客的亲属表示，他们要求马来西亚航空、波音公司、飞机发动机制造商劳斯莱斯和安联保险集团等提供赔偿。

The court did not release any details on the case, but state media said more than 40 relatives were seeking between 10 million and 80 million yuan ($1.4 million and $11.2 million) each in compensation.翻译:法院没有公布该案的任何细节，但官方媒体称，40 多名亲属正在寻求每人 1000 万至 8000 万元人民币（140 万美元至 1120 万美元）的赔偿。

Malaysia Airlines, Rolls-Royce, Allianz and Boeing did not immediately respond to requests for comment.翻译:马来西亚航空、劳斯莱斯、安联和波音没有立即回应置评请求。

Holding up signs saying "resume the search" and "re-establish an international investigation team", Jiang Hui, a spokesperson for the bereaved families, said Malaysia Airlines left them with no choice but to go to court to seek answers.翻译:遇难者家属发言人江辉举着“恢复搜寻”和“重新成立国际调查组”的牌子，表示马航让他们别无选择，只能上法庭寻求答案。

"'We are not responsible anymore' is their attitude," said Jiang, whose mother was on board.翻译:“‘我们不再负责’是他们的态度，”蒋的母亲在船上。

There was a heavy police presence outside Chaoyang District People's Court in Beijing before the hearing, with reporters cordoned off and unable to interact with the family members.翻译:开庭前，北京朝阳区人民法院外戒备森严，记者被封锁，无法与家属互动。

Some of the relatives, who spoke to reporters after the hearing, said they wanted the resumption of search efforts and for Malaysia Airlines to directly communicate with them as well as to provide them with psychological counselling.翻译:一些在听证会后接受记者采访的亲属表示，他们希望恢复搜寻工作，并希望马航能够直接与他们沟通，并为他们提供心理咨询。

Many said these demands were more important than the monetary compensation.翻译:许多人表示，这些要求比金钱补偿更重要。

"My mother died last year and she brought up my son. Until the very end I hid from her what really happened to him," said Beijing resident Bao Lanfang, 71, who lost her son and daughter-in-law on board. She said her husband had recently died after suffering from severe depression because of the incident.翻译:“我的母亲去年去世了，她抚养了我的儿子。直到最后我才向她隐瞒了他的真实情况，”71岁的北京居民鲍兰芳说，她在船上失去了儿子和儿媳。她说，她的丈夫因这起事件而患上严重抑郁症，最近去世了。

In March, another group of relatives urged the Malaysian government to allow U.S. seabed exploration firm Ocean Infinity to mount a new search for the missing plane.翻译:今年三月，另一群亲属敦促马来西亚政府允许美国海底勘探公司 Ocean Infinity 对失踪飞机进行新的搜索。

Reporting by Laurie Chen; editing by Miral Fahmy翻译:陈劳瑞报道；米拉尔·法赫米 编辑

item.title: 中国央行承诺支持内需
item.description:
China's central bank on Monday said it would fend off systemic risks to the economy and use forceful and targeted monetary policy to better support domestic demand.翻译:中国央行周一表示，将防范经济系统性风险，运用强有力、有针对性的货币政策更好地支持内需。

In its quarterly policy implementation report, the bank laid out the general direction of financial policy and said it would use a variety of monetary tools at its disposal to ensure sufficient liquidity.翻译:在季度政策执行报告中，央行明确了金融政策的总体方向，并表示将运用多种货币工具，确保流动性充足。

"Prudent monetary policy should be precise and forceful, with greater emphasis on cross-cyclical and countercyclical adjustments, enriching the monetary policy toolbox," the bank said.翻译:央行表示，稳健的货币政策要精准有力，更加注重跨周期和逆周期调节，丰富货币政策工具箱。

The bank added it would "further unblock the monetary policy transmission mechanism", enhance the stability of financial support for the real economy and keep prices "reasonably stable".翻译:该行补充称，将“进一步畅通货币政策传导机制”，增强金融支持实体经济的稳定性，保持物价“合理稳定”。

China's economy is gaining momentum, but it faces challenges such as an imbalanced global economic recovery and an unstable foundation for domestic economic recovery, the central bank said.翻译:央行表示，中国经济发展势头良好，但也面临全球经济复苏不平衡、国内经济复苏基础不稳定等挑战。

Beijing has launched a slew of policy measures this year, seeking to shore up a feeble post-pandemic recovery amid a persistent property sector downturn, local government debt risks, slow global growth and geopolitical tensions.翻译:北京今年推出了一系列政策措施，在房地产行业持续低迷、地方政府债务风险、全球经济增长放缓和地缘政治紧张局势的背景下，寻求支撑疫情后微弱的复苏。

The bank said it would guide financial institutions to resolve local debt risks and noted there was urgency for faster economic transformation.翻译:该行表示将引导金融机构化解地方债务风险，并指出加快经济转型的紧迫性。

"Supply and demand dynamics in the property market have greatly changed," the central bank said.翻译:央行表示，“房地产市场供需格局发生较大变化。”

The bank said it would keep the yuan -- which has come under pressure on the foreign exchange market this year -- "basically stable" and strive to foster a sound monetary and financial environment.翻译:央行表示，今年在外汇市场面临压力的情况下，将保持人民币汇率“基本稳定”，努力营造良好的货币金融环境。

It reiterated that it expects to achieve around 5% growth this year.翻译:它重申，预计今年将实现5%左右的增长。

item.title: 中国表示重视MH370事件的后续行动
item.description:
China values the follow-up to the incident of MH370, a Malaysia Airlines flight that went missing nearly 10 years ago, and hopes all sides maintain close communication and properly handle this issue, the foreign ministry said on Monday.翻译:外交部周一表示，中方重视近十年前马航MH370航班失踪事件的后续进展，希望各方保持密切沟通，妥善处理这一问题。

Spokesperson Wang Wenbin made the comments after a media report of a Chinese court holding the first hearing of a liability lawsuit filed by relatives of passengers on MH370.翻译:发言人汪文斌是在媒体报道中国法院就马航MH370乘客亲属提起的责任诉讼举行首次听证会后发表上述言论的。
